If you are looking for an attorney who will thoroughly educate you as to your options, whether they include filing bankruptcy or not, Eric Schwab is a great choice. He is extremely personable, non-judgmental and completely competent in this area of the law as he has been practicing it exclusively over 20 years, alone. In fact, if you are a business owner, he is an expert at analyzing Chapter 13 cases. You would think he would be expensive with all that knowledge and experience, but whatever your needs are, Chapter 7, 13 or 12, He is fair and reasonably priced.
